title: WarpStream Overview
description: Monitor the health and performance of your WarpStream Agents

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a high level overview of your WarpStream agents.
It allows you to track the health of your agents deployments, as well as your Kafka-based applications.

definition.title: Fetch Partial Bytes Due to Errors
Fetch Max Pointers in a Single Request
Consumer Groups Lag in Seconds by Topic
Consumer Groups Lag in Seconds by Topic/Partition
Consumer Groups Max Offset by Topic
Dead Files Scanner: Checked vs Deleted Files
Compaction Files per Level (Indicator of Compaction Lag)
File Cache Per Request Bytes Read Average (Server)
Flush File Size in Bytes - Compressed
Flush File Size in Bytes - Uncompressed
